title: Blog updates and notice
author: alexsour
description: A few updates have been made to the blog! A search bar has been added, the blog is now faster and more! Unfortunately, we are encountering some issues.
content:
A few features have been added to the blog!

You'll now see a search bar, which allows you to search for articles with certain text in their title, description, author name, content, or even their date!

I also made navigating the blog not change the page, but rather only update the parts of the page that need changing, skipping reloading the header, footer, code, style and more! The blog should be WAY faster now.

Beyond that, general improvements to how the blog looks have been made.

Let me know if you have any other ideas for the blog, I'm open to suggestions!

Also, right now the About Us page is broken; I accidentally overwrote it with the blog. For now it's down, but I'll fix it in 1-2 hours with a backup.

Sorry for the inconvenience!
